General.Name: AUPU Home Style Corp Ltd
General.Description: AUPU Home Style Corporation Limited engages in the research and development, production, sales, and service of various household products in China. Its products include integrated ceilings, lighting, integrated walls, integrated stoves, clothes dryers, fresh air systems, ventilation fans, full-function balcony, humidifiers, and yuba, as well as bathroom heaters. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Hangzhou, China. AUPU Home Style Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of Tricosco Limited.
